property.contentview.vm:
### ### Display document contents in "view" mode. ### ## ------------------------------- ## Compute the content to display ## ------------------------------- ## Honor the syntax if it's passed in the request. #set($outputSyntax = $xwiki.getAvailableRendererSyntax($request.outputSyntax, $request.outputSyntaxVersion)) #if ($outputSyntax) ## If the passed syntax is not an HTML-compatible syntax we need to HTML-escape it so that it can be ## displayed fine in HTML (since at the point this vm file is called we're already inside an HTML page with ## panels on the side, header, etc). #set($syntaxType = $outputSyntax.type.toIdString()) #if (($syntaxType == "xhtml") || ($syntaxType == "html")) #set ($renderedContent = $tdoc.getRenderedContent($outputSyntax)) #else ## Make sure to print correctly the result when it's not HTML #set ($renderedContent = "
$escapetool.html($tdoc.getRenderedContent($outputSyntax))
") #end #else #set ($renderedContent = $tdoc.getRenderedContent()) #end ## ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ## Compute title to display and modify rendered content accordingly. ## ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ##template("titlevars.vm") ## ---------------------------- ## Display the title ## ---------------------------- ##

$titleToDisplay

## -------------------------------------------------------------------------- ## Drop permissions as they are no longer needed. This allows us not to have ## to review the code below for security holes since nothing bad can happen. ## -------------------------------------------------------------------------- $xcontext.dropPermissions() ## ---------------------------- ## Display the shortcuts ## ---------------------------- #if($displayShortcuts) ##template("shortcuts.vm") #end ## ---------------------------- ## Display the rendered content ## ----------------------------
$renderedContent
## ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ## Display the footnotes if the document is in 1.0 syntax and if there are any defined ## ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #set($footnotes = "#putFootnotes()") $xwiki.renderText($footnotes, $doc)

property.footer.vm:
$!copyright
#set ($version = $xwiki.getWebPreference("version")) #if ("$!version" == "") #set ($version = $xwiki.getXWikiPreference("version")) #end #if ("$!version" != "") #set ($version = $xwiki.parseContent($version)) #else #set ($version = $!xwiki.version) #end
$version
$context.unsetLinksQueryString()
Normal Version
## make sure links are unset $context.unsetLinksQueryString()

property.header.vm:
## make sure all links stay in this skin $context.setLinksQueryString("skin=${xwiki.skin}")
### ### Display Panel ### ### Extract and display the panel code from the panel object ### #macro(iosdisplaypanel $name) #set ($pobj = "") ## Since Velocity does not do any assignment if the RHS is null we need to reset the paneldoc ## as otherwise the previously set panel will be displayed. getDocument() returns null if the ## user doesn't have the right to view a document. #set ($paneldoc = "") #set ($paneldoc = $xwiki.getDocument($name)) #if ($paneldoc != "") #set ($pobj = $paneldoc.getObject("Panels.PanelClass")) #if (!$pobj) ## discarded #else $!doc.display("content", "view", $pobj) #end #end #end #iosdisplaypanel("Panels.QuickLinks")
#set($parents = $util.arrayList) #set($discard = $parents.add($doc.fullName)) #macro(breadcrumb $doc $string $level) #set($parent = $doc.parent) #if(($parent != "") && ($level < 6) && (!$parents.contains($parent))) #set($discard = $parents.add($parent)) #set($pdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($parent).getTranslatedDocument()) #set($pdocurl = $pdoc.getURL("view")) #set($nstring = "$xwiki.getXMLEncoded(${pdoc.getRenderedTitle('plain/1.0')}) » $string") #set($level = $level + 1) #breadcrumb($pdoc $nstring $level) #else $string #end #end #if($context.getMode()==0) ## Visible only in a page
$xwiki.getXMLEncoded(${doc.space}): #breadcrumb($doc "$xwiki.getXMLEncoded($tdoc.getRenderedTitle('plain/1.0'))" 0)
#if($xwiki.isMultiLingual()) #set($defaultLanguage = "$!{doc.getDefaultLanguage()}") #if($defaultLanguage == '') #set($defaultLanguage = "$!{doc.getLanguage()}") #end #if($defaultLanguage == '') #set($defaultLanguage = "default") #end $defaultLanguage #set ($wikiSettingsLanguages = $!xwiki.getXWikiPreference('languages').trim().split('\s*[,| ]\s*')) #set ($hasLanguagesSet = $wikiSettingsLanguages.size() > 1 || "$!wikiSettingsLanguages.get(0)" != '') #foreach($lang in $doc.translationList) #if(!$hasLanguagesSet || $wikiSettingsLanguages.contains($lang)) $!lang #end #end #end
## Last modification $msg.get('core.footer.modification', [$xwiki.getUserName($tdoc.author), $xwiki.formatDate($tdoc.date)]) - $msg.get('core.footer.creation', [$xwiki.getUserName($doc.creator), $xwiki.formatDate($doc.creationDate)]) #if($tdoc.realLanguage != $doc.realLanguage) $msg.get('core.footer.translationCreation', [$tdoc.realLanguage, $xwiki.getUserName($tdoc.creator), $xwiki.formatDate($tdoc.creationDate)])
#end
## Edit Menu ## Compute the default edit mode #set($editaction = $doc.getDefaultEditMode()) ▼$msg.get('XWiki.XWikiPreferences_menu') · $msg.get('view') $msg.get('core.menu.edit.wiki') $msg.get('core.menu.edit.wysiwyg') · $msg.get('admin.panels') $msg.get('docextra.comments') $msg.get('docextra.attachments') $msg.get('docextra.information') #if (!$xcontext.action.startsWith('login')) #if ($isGuest) #set ($loginurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogin', 'login', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.getRequestURL())")) $!msg.get('login') #else #set ($logouturl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogout', 'logout', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.getRequestURL())")) $!msg.get('logout') #end #end
#end

property.panels.vm:
### ### Display Panel ### ### Extract and display the panel code from the panel object ### #macro(iosdisplaypanel $name) #set ($pobj = "") ## Since Velocity does not do any assignment if the RHS is null we need to reset the paneldoc ## as otherwise the previously set panel will be displayed. getDocument() returns null if the ## user doesn't have the right to view a document. #set ($paneldoc = "") #set ($paneldoc = $xwiki.getDocument($name)) #if ($paneldoc != "") #set ($pobj = $paneldoc.getObject("Panels.PanelClass")) #if (!$pobj) ## discarded #else $!doc.display("content", "view", $pobj) #end #end #end ## TODO: replace with real translations

$msg.get('admin.panels') $msg.get('xe.search.of') $escapetool.xml($doc.getPlainTitle())

## ---------------------------- ## Display the shortcuts ## ---------------------------- #if($displayShortcuts) #template("shortcuts.vm") #end #if($showLeftPanels == "1" || $request.getParameter("forceLeftPanels")) #foreach($panel in $leftPanels) #iosdisplaypanel($panel.trim()) #end #end #if($showRightPanels == "1" || $request.getParameter("forceRightPanels")) #foreach($panel in $rightPanels) #iosdisplaypanel($panel.trim()) #end #end
